explanation: Azure Front Door is a global entry point providing secure app delivery with intelligent routing.
Service Fabric is a distributed systems platform for packaging and managing microservices.
Azure Firewall is a managed, cloud-native firewall service with built-in high availability.
Firewall Manager provides central security policy and route management for cloud-based security perimeters.
Key Vault safeguards cryptographic keys and secrets used by cloud applications and services.
Security Center provides advanced threat protection across hybrid workloads in Azure.
Sentinel is a scalable, cloud-native SIEM and SOAR solution providing intelligent security analytics.
Azure AD is Microsoft's cloud-based identity and access management service.
Blueprints enable organizations to define repeatable sets of Azure resources that implement governance requirements.
Cloud Shell is an interactive, authenticated, browser-accessible shell for managing Azure resources.
Data Share enables organizations to share data securely with external partners in a controlled manner.
Azure Managed Grafana is a fully managed service for analytics and monitoring dashboards.
Azure Managed Prometheus is a fully managed Prometheus-compatible monitoring service.
Private Link enables access to Azure services over a private endpoint in your virtual network.
Azure Arc extends Azure management and services to any infrastructure across multi-cloud and on-premises.
Lighthouse enables service providers to deliver managed services with precision and at scale.
Azure Policy helps enforce organizational standards and assess compliance at scale.
Resource Manager is the deployment and management service for Azure providing a management layer.
Logic Apps is a cloud service that helps automate and orchestrate tasks, business processes, and workflows.
Functions is an event-driven serverless compute platform that can solve complex orchestration problems.

question_text: Maximum execution timeout for Azure Functions?
explanation: The maximum timeout is 10 minutes for consumption plan, but can be increased in other plans.
Managed identities provide an automatically managed identity in Azure AD for applications to use when connecting to Azure resources.
Disk Encryption helps encrypt Windows and Linux IaaS VM disks using BitLocker and DM-Crypt.

question_text: What is VNet Peering in Azure?
explanation: VNet peering seamlessly connects Azure virtual networks, merging them into one for connectivity.
Virtual WAN is a networking service bringing many networking, security, and routing functionalities together.
Monitor delivers comprehensive observability for applications and infrastructure across Azure and on-premises.
Autoscale allows you to automatically scale resources based on demand or schedule.
Load Balancer distributes inbound traffic among backend resources based on rules and health probes.

question_text: What is Azure Blob Storage lifecycle management?
explanation: Lifecycle management automatically transitions blob data to appropriate access tiers or expires data.
ExpressRoute extends on-premises networks into Microsoft cloud over a private connection.
Application Gateway is a web traffic load balancer that enables managing traffic to web applications.
DDoS Protection provides enhanced DDoS mitigation capabilities to protect Azure resources.
Defender provides advanced threat protection for hybrid workloads across Azure and on-premises.
Backup provides simple, secure, and cost-effective solutions to back up and recover data in Azure.
Data Factory is a cloud-based data integration service for creating data-driven workflows.

question_text: What is Azure Data Lake Storage?
explanation: Data Lake Storage is a scalable data lake for high-performance analytics workloads.
Synapse Analytics is an integrated analytics service bringing together big data and data warehousing.
Stream Analytics is a real-time analytics and complex event-processing engine for high volumes of streaming data.
Container Instances offers the fastest and simplest way to run containers in Azure without managing VMs.
AKS simplifies deploying, managing, and scaling containerized applications using Kubernetes.
Container Apps is a fully managed serverless container service for running microservices and apps.
DevOps provides developer services for teams to plan work, collaborate on code, and build/deploy applications.
Pipelines automates building, testing, and deploying applications to any platform.
Repos provides private Git repositories for source control of your code.
Artifacts creates and shares packages with your team, integrating with CI/CD.
Service Bus is a fully managed enterprise message broker with message queues and publish-subscribe topics.
Event Grid is a fully managed event routing service enabling event-driven, reactive programming.
Event Hubs is a big data streaming platform and event ingestion service for millions of events per second.
CDN is a global solution for delivering high-bandwidth content by caching content at edge locations.
Traffic Manager is a DNS-based traffic load balancer distributing traffic optimally across global Azure regions.
API Management helps organizations publish APIs to external and internal consumers securely and at scale.
App Service is an HTTP-based service for hosting web applications, REST APIs, and mobile backends.
B2C is a customer identity access management solution enabling custom-branded sign-up/sign-in experiences.
App Configuration provides a service to centrally manage application settings and feature flags.
Dedicated Host provides physical servers hosting Azure VMs for Windows and Linux workloads with isolation.
Confidential Computing protects data in use by performing computations in hardware-based trusted execution environments.
Bastion provides secure and seamless RDP/SSH connectivity to VMs directly through Azure portal without public IP.
Information Protection helps classify and protect documents/emails through labels and encryption.
Cost Management helps monitor, allocate, and optimize Azure spending with reporting and budgeting.
Advisor analyzes resource configurations and usage to provide personalized recommendations.
Migrate provides a centralized hub for assessing and migrating on-premises servers, apps, and data to Azure.
Site Recovery ensures business continuity by keeping business apps/workloads running during outages.
NetApp Files delivers enterprise-grade, high-performance file shares in Azure powered by NetApp.

question_text: What is Azure Database for PostgreSQL?
explanation: Database for PostgreSQL is a fully managed PostgreSQL database service with enterprise capabilities.
Cosmos DB is a globally distributed, multi-model database service with turnkey global distribution.
SQL Database is a fully managed relational database with auto-scaling, intelligence, and robust security.

question_text: What is Azure SQL Managed Instance?
explanation: SQL Managed Instance is a scalable cloud database service combining SQL Server compatibility with benefits of PaaS.

question_text: What is Azure Database for MySQL?
explanation: Database for MySQL is a fully managed MySQL database service for app developers.

question_text: What is Azure Database for MariaDB?
explanation: Database for MariaDB is a fully managed MariaDB database service built on the community edition.

question_text: What is Azure Cache for Redis?
explanation: Cache for Redis provides an in-memory data store based on Redis for high-performance applications.
Data Explorer is a fast and highly scalable data exploration service for log/telemetry analytics.
Databricks is an Apache Spark-based analytics platform optimized for Azure, offering collaborative workspaces.
A,HDInsight is a managed, full-spectrum, open-source analytics service for enterprises.
Analysis Services provides enterprise-grade semantic data models for business reports and client applications.
Purview provides a unified data governance service managing data estate across on-premises, multi-cloud, and SaaS.
Machine Learning accelerates the end-to-end machine learning lifecycle with enterprise-grade capabilities.
Cognitive Services provides pre-built AI models as APIs for vision, speech, language, and decision capabilities.
Bot Service provides an integrated environment for developing, testing, and deploying intelligent bots.
Speech Services adds speech capabilities like speech-to-text, text-to-speech, and speech translation to apps.
Language Understanding builds natural language understanding into apps, bots, and IoT devices.
Form Recognizer extracts text, key/value pairs, and tables from documents using machine learning.
Personalizer helps choose the best content to show users, improving experiences through reinforcement learning.
Video Analyzer extracts insights from video recordings and live videos using AI.
IoT Hub is a managed service enabling reliable and secure bi-directional communications between IoT devices and Azure.
IoT Edge extends cloud intelligence to edge devices, enabling them to act on data locally.
IoT Central is a fully managed IoT SaaS solution making it easy to connect, monitor, and manage IoT assets.
Digital Twins creates comprehensive digital models of physical environments for IoT solutions.

question_text: What is Azure Time Series Insights?
explanation: Time Series Insights stores, visualizes, and queries large volumes of time-series data from IoT devices.
Maps provides geospatial services adding location data and mapping functionalities to applications.
Communication platform,A,Communication Services adds voice, video, chat, and SMS capabilities to applications.
PlayFab provides backend services, live ops, and analytics for game developers.
Lab Services enables setting up and providing on-demand access to preconfigured virtual machines for labs.
VMware Solution lets you run VMware workloads natively on Azure with integration to Azure services.
Stack extends Azure services and capabilities to your environment of choicefrom on-premises to edge.
Data Box is a physical migration service for transferring large amounts of data to Azure offline.
File Sync centralizes file shares in Azure Files while keeping the flexibility of an on-premises file server.
HPC Cache speeds access to data for high-performance computing tasks by caching files in Azure.
CycleCloud creates, manages, and operates HPC clusters in Azure for any workload.
Batch runs large-scale parallel and high-performance computing applications efficiently in the cloud.
Virtual Desktop delivers a secure remote desktop experience from anywhere.
Azure Managed Grafana is a fully managed service for analytics and monitoring dashboards.
Chaos Studio helps improve application resilience by conducting controlled chaos experiments.
Load Testing is a fully managed load-testing service for generating high-scale load.
Spring Apps is a fully managed service for Spring Boot applications, eliminating infrastructure management.

question_text: What is Azure Static Web Apps?
explanation: Static Web Apps is a service automatically building and deploying full-stack web apps from code repository.
